Classes in net.philsprojects.task that implement TaskListener
 class Task<R>
          A single action that can be executed synchronously or asynchronously.
 class TaskCollection
          A collection of tasks when executed will return a list of results.
 class TaskFork<R>
          A clone of a task used for forking.
 class TaskGroup
          A collection of tasks that must start at the exact same time (execute concurrently).
 class TaskList
          A collection of tasks that must be executed in order, one after another.
 class TaskListenerAdapter<R>
          An adapter which implements all TaskListener methods.
 class TaskSet
          A collection of tasks that do not have a particular execution order.
 

Methods in net.philsprojects.task with parameters of type TaskListener
 boolean Task.async(TaskListener<R> async)
          Executes this task and notifies the given listener when it has finished.
